鼨鼨鼨

鼨字的基本解释

鼨
zhōng
豹文鼠。

鼨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōng］
［《廣韻》職戎切，平東，章。］
鼨鼠。一种有像豹一样斑纹的鼠。

鼨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼠字部】　鼨； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1528第09
【唐韻】職戎切【集韻】【韻會】之戎切，?音終。【爾雅·釋獸】鼨鼠。【註】未詳。【說文】豹文鼠也。　又【集韻】徒冬切，音彤。義同。○按《爾雅》本文，鼨鼠，豹文鼮鼠。郭璞鼨註未詳，鼮註鼠文彩如豹者。許愼鼨註豹文鼠。豹文二字，或上屬，或下屬，未知孰是。

鼨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鼨字的起名意思

暂无。

Spit
Basic explanation of words
Spit
zhōng
Leopard Rat.
Spit
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōng］
["Guangyun" Job Rongqie, Pingdong, Chapter. ]
Squirrel. A rat with stripes like a leopard.
Spit
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Mouse Character Department] 　鼨; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1528 Page 09
【Tang Yun】Job Rongqie 【Jiyun】【Yunhui】The Rongqie, the sound ends. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Skewer. 【Note】Unknown. [Said the text] Leopard and mouse also.　[Jiyun] Tu Dongqie, Yintong. The same meaning. ○According to the text of "Er Ya", squirrel, leopard squirrel. Guo Puxu's note is unclear, but the roe's note is like a leopard. Xu Mingyan noted the leopard mouse. The word Leopard, or superordinate, or subordinate, is unknown.
